title: Tonga tsunami: Before and after eruption
description: Satellite and aerial images show impact of eruption of underwater volcano near Tonga island chain.

title: Downing Street party: Boris Johnson was warned about lockdown drinks, says Dominic Cummings
description: But No 10 has strongly denied claims by the PM's ex-aide that Boris Johnson ignored concerns.

title: Beckham stars as Rams outclass Cardinals to set up meeting with Brady's Bucs
description: Odell Beckham Jr scored the first play-off touchdown of his career to set the Los Angeles Rams on course for a 34-11 win over the Arizona Cardinals.

title: Crime bill: Lords defeats for government's protest clamp-down plans
description: Peers vote against plans to clamp down on noisy protests and in favour of making misogyny a hate crime.

title: Tonga runway ash blocks New Zealand air relief
description: After the tsunami New Zealand promises aid, but ash on Tonga's runway is hindering relief efforts.

title: Self-harm guidance to include advice for schools and prisons
description: It's not just mental health professionals who have to spot self-harm, updated health guidance says.

title: Magistrates to get more powers to jail criminals for longer
description: In a bid to tackle court backlogs, magistrates in England and Wales will be able to jail criminals for longer.

title: Specialist mental health unit failures exposed by patients
description: Patients say they’ve been placed in unsafe environments, often far from home.

title: Russia-Ukraine crisis: UK sending weapons to defend Ukraine, says defence secretary
description: The defence secretary says he is sending short-range anti-tank missiles amid Russian invasion fears.

title: Plastic crisis needs binding treaty, report says
description: Pollution from plastics is a global emergency in need of a robust UN treaty, according to a report.

title: Anti-vax protests: ‘Sovereign citizens’ fight UK Covid vaccine rollout
description: Activists with anti-vax beliefs are taking "direct action" against hospitals and schools.

title: Cate Blanchett: I dressed up as my daughter's teacher in lockdown
description: The actress discusses her new film Nightmare Alley and the unlikely role she took on during lockdown.

title: Collarwali: Remembering India’s ‘super mum’ tigress
description: Charismatic Collarwali played a key role in boosting tiger numbers and made her sanctuary famous.

title: What can we do to get more women into coding?
description: How visual, auditory and kinesthetic tools used to teach kids coding should be adapted for adults.

title: Mexico missing: 'If I find a body, I recover a piece of my son'
description: With nearly 100,000 disappeared people in Mexico, families have taken on the search themselves.

title: Morrisons confirms sick pay cut for unvaccinated staff
description: The supermarket joins a list of firms which pay the legal minimum to unvaccinated staff obliged to isolate.

title: Purges and piranhas: Why we love a crazy North Korea story
description: North Korea is frequently the subject of news stories in Western media. But many stories are unfounded or blown out of proportion.

title: Co-op store manager who campaigned to protect staff from abuse honoured
description: Claire Saunders, who works for Co-op, was honoured in the New Year Honours list for her work.
